characters.name: Bob the Brave
characters.shortDescription: A stout warrior with a rusty sword.
characters.longDescription: Bob the Brave stands tall, his dented armor clanking softly with each breath.

characters.name: Lina the Quiet
characters.shortDescription: A robed figure with thoughtful eyes.
characters.longDescription: Lina the Quiet watches everything with calm curiosity, missing nothing.

characters.name: Torin the Swift
characters.shortDescription: A lean scout with quick reflexes.
characters.longDescription: Torin the Swift shifts his weight from foot to foot, never quite still.

characters.name: Mira the Clever
characters.longDescription: Mira the Clever peers around, muttering half-formed theories under her breath.

characters.name: Grom the Gruff
characters.shortDescription: A stocky dwarf with a heavy hammer.
characters.longDescription: Grom the Gruff grumbles as if the stone itself has offended him.

characters.name: Selene the Shadow
characters.shortDescription: A cloaked figure who moves like smoke.
characters.longDescription: Selene the Shadow seems half-present, half-vanished at the edges of your vision.
characters.appearanceInRoom: {name} lingers at the edge of the light.

characters.name: Finn the Fearless
characters.shortDescription: A bard with a battered lute.
characters.longDescription: Finn the Fearless hums a tune that almost drowns out the dripping.

characters.name: Nyx the Mystic
characters.longDescription: Nyx the Mystic stares into the middle distance, as if seeing something far away.

characters.name: Orla the Stoic
characters.shortDescription: A knight whose armor bears many marks.
characters.longDescription: Orla the Stoic stands ready, calm and steady no matter what comes.

characters.name: Jax the Jester
characters.shortDescription: A trickster with a sly grin.
characters.longDescription: Jax the Jester shifts from foot to foot, eyes sparkling with mischief.
